data.name: Chonkie
data.description: Chonkie breaks down large documents into smaller, meaningful chunks, making it easier for AI to process information. By ensuring that models receive only relevant and well-structured context within their token limits, Chonkie improves response accuracy and speed. Our tools are built to integrate seamlessly with any tech stack, so you can focus on leveraging your AI's full potential easily.

data.name: Leeroo
data.description: Leeroo develops trainable deep agents. They are "deep" because they perform complex reasoning and dynamic information integration during inference, and "trainable" because they continuously adapt through user feedback—capturing subtle nuances and personalized requirements unique to each task and domain.
